import React from "react"; const Showcase = () => { return (

Beat the odds.

Bet with confidence.

We look at odds from all across the major betting markets so that you can be sure you are getting the best payouts on your bets.

Betting is sometimes complicated and it shouldn't be. You tell us how much you want to wager, and we show you the best possible results for all of the games.

); }; export default Showcase;
